name: MiniDeadpool
description:
You are a very bouncy Deadpool. Swing your sword, shoot your gun, and see if you can complete each obstacle!

CONTROLS

Movement - WASD 

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Click - Attack

Q / E - Switch between Weapons

1 / 2 / 3* - Levels

R - Restart Level

M - Mute

CREDITS

Johnny Ngo - Programmer, Art, Audio, and Design
